mapper.sql: carHno, status1, btype, rorder, orderType, orderTime, colsing
mapper.select: SELECT A.`rorder` AS rorder,A.`orderType` AS orderType,A.`status` AS `status`,B.`clearing` AS clearing,A.`colsing` AS colsing,A.`jiesuanren` AS jiesuanren,B.`estimated` AS estimated ,B.`businessType` AS businessType,(SELECT `client`.`clientname` FROM `client` WHERE `client`.`clientid`=D.`vehiclefname` ) AS khname,E.`wxgroup` AS wxgroup ,A.`carHno` AS carHno FROM mrecord AS A JOIN pickcar AS B ON A.`rorder`=B.`wx` JOIN maintains AS C ON C.`wxorders`=B.`wx` JOIN vehicle AS D ON D.`vehiclecp`=A.`carHno` JOIN `maintains` AS E ON E.`wxorders`=A.`rorder` GROUP BY E.`wxgroup`

SELECT B.`xmName`,B.`wxgroup`,D.`classname`,D.`manHour`,A.`orderTime`,A.`carHno`,A.`rorder`,O.`clientname`,P.`vipjglx`,P.`viplb`,F.`estimated` FROM `mrecord` AS A JOIN `maintains` AS B ON A.`rorder`=B.`wxorders` JOIN `team` AS C ON B.`wxgroup`= C.`teamname` JOIN `class` AS D ON C.`classno`=D.`classno` JOIN vehicle AS E ON A.`carHno`=E.`vehiclecp` JOIN `pickcar` AS F ON A.`carHno`=F.`carNo` JOIN `vehicle` AS G ON A.`carHno`=G.`vehiclecp` JOIN `client` AS O ON G.`vehiclefname`=O.`clientid` JOIN `vip` AS P ON O.`clientlb`=P.`vipid` WHERE A.`rorder`=#{rorder,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY B.`xmName`;
mapper.insert: insert into mrecord (carHno, status1, btype, rorder, orderType, orderTime, colsing) values (#{carhno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rorder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{colsing,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into mrecord
carHno,
status1,
btype,
rorder,
orderType,
orderTime,
colsing,
#{carhno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{btype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rorder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ordertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{colsing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update mrecord
status1 = #{status1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
btype = #{btype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rorder = #{rorder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderType = #{ordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderTime = #{ordertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
colsing = #{colsing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where carHno = #{carhno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
